snippet: A 4-year-old girl mistakenly took hundreds of packets of heroin to her day care center and began passing them out to classmates, thinking it was candy, the state police said Tuesday.
abstract: Young girl in Delaware mistakenly takes hundreds of packets of heroin to her day care center and passes them out to classmates, thinking it was candy; girl's mother is charged with child endangerment and maintaining a drug property.
lead_paragraph: A 4-year-old girl mistakenly took hundreds of packets of heroin to her day care center and began passing them out to classmates, thinking it was candy, the state police said Tuesday.

headline.main: Delaware: Toddler Takes Heroin to Day Care
headline.print_headline: Delaware: Toddler Takes Heroin to Day Care
